blog.name: thefandomimagine

blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

summary: Imagine decorating for Christmas with the Avengers
title: Imagine decorating for Christmas with the Avengers
body:
Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanoff, Wanda Maximoff, Vision, Bucky Barnes, Thor, Peter Parker, Pepper Potts

Pairings: Tony Stark x Daughter!Reader, Tony x Pepper, Steve x Bucky, Peter x Reader

Warnings: None! Pure holiday fluff!


Christmas music plays all throughout Avengers Headquarters as everyone helps decorate the giant pine tree Tony Stark, your father, had gotten He thought having a big tree would mean spending more time decorating. You love the idea of having everyone around for the holidays to decorate and bake cookies.You considered the other Avengers your family because the only biological family you have left is Tony. 

You and your boyfriend, Peter, are working on one section of the Christmas tree. Natasha and Wanda are keeping track of the ornaments that are secured in a large trunk. They hold little boxes full of ornaments ready to hand out to you and Peter. Thor and Vision are working on the higher sections of the tree nobody else can reach. Steve and Bucky are cuddling on the sofa watching everyone else decorate while drinking Tony’s famous hot chocolate. Tony and Bruce are on the other side of the tree opposite you and Peter decorating.

“Dad, did you see that ornament of me and you?” You ask Tony, walking over to him. 

“Yeah, Aunt Nat should have it. I didn’t see anyone grab it,” answers Tony, kissing your head.

“I got it!” Natasha calls, holding up your favorite ornament encasing a picture of you and Tony. She hands it to you and walk back over to Tony. 

“You wanna put it on together, sweetie?” He asks you with a bright smile on his face. 

“Of course, Papa!” 

Each of you grab a part of the string that the ornament hangs from and put it on one of the little branches of the tree. You both stand back to admire it and Tony embraces you in a big, strong hug. 

“It’s beautiful. but we need to update it,” you note, looking up at Tony.

He exhales deeply, agreeing. “Yeah…I know, bug. It’s been quite a while since we took that.”

Peter stands there with a couple of ornaments in his hands. “Y’know, the tree isn’t gonna decorate itself.”

You and Tony give him a look, separating from each other after your father kisses your head. You go to Peter and take an ornament from him, kissing his cheek. You turn to your uncles sitting on the couch.

“Uncle Steve, Uncle Bucky, do you guys wanna come help?” You ask them, nodding towards the tree. 

“In a minute, Y/N, promise. Uncle Buck is sleeping on me,” Steve replies quietly.

“Awww,” the rest of you chorus, turning to look at the sleeping soldier. His hair is tied back in a braid, thanks to you, and he is wearing his Christmas cat pajamas, also from you. He is curled up to Steve with his legs folded beneath him and his head shoved in Steve’s side. 

You run over to the other couch and grab a blanket for him and cover him up with it. Steve thanks you and you return to Peter. 

“You’re so sweet, y’know that?” Peter tells you, returning a kiss on your cheek.

“Yeah, I get that a lot,” you say, winking at your dad. He smirks at you, putting an ornament on the tree as Peter wraps an arm around you. 

“Merry Christmas, everyone. I love you all,” you say.

They hold little boxes full of ornaments ready to hand out to you and Peter. Thor and Vision are working on the higher sections of the tree nobody else can reach. Steve and Bucky are cuddling on the sofa watching everyone else decorate while drinking Tony’s famous hot chocolate. Tony and Bruce are on the other side of the tree opposite you and Peter decorating.

“Dad, did you see that ornament of me and you?” You ask Tony, walking over to him. 

“Yeah, Aunt Nat should have it. I didn’t see anyone grab it,” answers Tony, kissing your head.

“I got it!” Natasha calls, holding up your favorite ornament encasing a picture of you and Tony. She hands it to you and walk back over to Tony. 

“You wanna put it on together, sweetie?” He asks you with a bright smile on his face. 

“Of course, Papa!” 

Each of you grab a part of the string that the ornament hangs from and put it on one of the little branches of the tree. You both stand back to admire it and Tony embraces you in a big, strong hug. 

“It’s beautiful. but we need to update it,” you note, looking up at Tony.

He exhales deeply, agreeing. “Yeah…I know, bug. It’s been quite a while since we took that.”

Peter stands there with a couple of ornaments in his hands. “Y’know, the tree isn’t gonna decorate itself.”

You and Tony give him a look, separating from each other after your father kisses your head. You go to Peter and take an ornament from him, kissing his cheek. You turn to your uncles sitting on the couch.

“Uncle Steve, Uncle Bucky, do you guys wanna come help?” You ask them, nodding towards the tree. 

“In a minute, Y/N, promise. Uncle Buck is sleeping on me,” Steve replies quietly.

“Awww,” the rest of you chorus, turning to look at the sleeping soldier. His hair is tied back in a braid, thanks to you, and he is wearing his Christmas cat pajamas, also from you. He is curled up to Steve with his legs folded beneath him and his head shoved in Steve’s side. 

You run over to the other couch and grab a blanket for him and cover him up with it. Steve thanks you and you return to Peter. 

“You’re so sweet, y’know that?” Peter tells you, returning a kiss on your cheek.

“Yeah, I get that a lot,” you say, winking at your dad. He smirks at you, putting an ornament on the tree as Peter wraps an arm around you. 

“Merry Christmas, everyone. I love you all,” you say.
